'''1.15.1 Pre-release 1''' (known as '''1.15.1-pre1''' in the launcher) is the first and only pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.15.1]], released on December 12, 2019. This is the final pre-release released in 2019.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-15-1-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.15.1 Pre-Release 1|December 12, 2019}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Network handling'''
* Improved network handling of invalid [[biome]] IDs.

'''Performance'''
* Optimized [[chunk]] rendering performance, especially for chunks with many different [[block]] states.

'''Other'''
* Fixed an error that was spammed to the game's log files caused by custom [[monster spawner]]s spawning [[villager]]s.
* Fixed a crash that occurred in the [[Realms]] screen.</onlyinclude>
